{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ruckus Wireless |model=MediaFlex 2825 |revision=(VX2825) |upc= |ean= |asin=B00EHZ5JW8 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/21/2006 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=S9GVX2X25 |ic_id=5912A-VX2X25 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2315A |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2315A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=V54-HOME001 |default_ssid_regex=^V54-HOME001$ |default_ip=192.168.20.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:13:92 |oui_eth=00:13:92 }} "Ruckus Wireless" and "Giterdone 6" is silkscreened on the top of the board in the FCC photos. :"FAB 1001200 REV 5" is on the bottom of the board.
*[http://www.goodgearguide.com.au/review/ruckus_wireless/mediaflex_vf-2825/220325/ Review on '''GoodGearGuide''']
